page.title: 15GALA WEEK ,THREE CROSSES
page.content: The School Parents' Association organised a series of events during this week to raise funds to purchase equipment for use in the School. Helping to create a carnival atmosphere in the village were such events as a pram race for adults,a sports evening, football competition, treasure hunt,disco and,finally,to conclude the proceedings,a fete held in the School playground.One thousand six hundred pounds was raised but what was perhaps more important was the community spirit which was again aroused.
